content: simple and clever **holder** 1 for your water bottle - perfect for when you re on the go and want to keep your hands free the net is crocheted in rainbow 8/8 and crocheted in a net pattern making it light and airy hang it around your neck or make the handle a little longer to let you wear it over your shoulder have fun **materials ** rainbow cotton 8/8 crochet hook 4 mm us size g/6 yarn usage approx 40g 1 4oz **size ** fits a 0 5 liter bottle approx 5-6 cm in diameter 1 9-2 3 inches **abbreviations** **magic_ring** magic_ring **chain** chain **st s ** stitch es **single_crochet** single_crochet **half_double_crochet** half_double_crochet **slip_stitch s ** slip_stitch es 1 https //hobbii com/bottle-holder utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=bottle-holder+hbtrack&utm_term=swr
